comment: /**  * Calls the action listeners {@link ActionListener#onFailure(Exception)} method with the given exception.  * This method is invoked for all exception thrown by {@link #doRun()}  */
code: /**  * Calls the action listeners {@link ActionListener#onFailure(Exception)} method with the given exception.  * This method is invoked for all exception thrown by {@link #doRun()}  */ @Override public void onFailure(Exception e) {     listener.onFailure(e). }
